title: Citibank UAE Goes Social
summary: Dubai - With the aim of helping to lead the ever-changing digital landscape and to be at forefront of where its customers are, Citibank UAE is proud to announce the launch of its Facebook page, www.facebook.com/CitibankUAE.
tag-3: Dubai – With the aim of helping to lead the ever-changing digital landscape and to be at forefront of where its customers are, Citibank UAE is proud to announce the launch of its Facebook page, www.facebook.com/CitibankUAE.
tag-4: With this new channel, Citibank UAE looks forward to staying in touch with its customers in real-time and enhancing customer relationship and satisfaction. This channel will feature announcements, press releases, photos, videos, showcase awards and featured privileges.
tag-5: Social media channels such as Facebook have grown significantly in the last few years in the GCC; more than half of UAE's population is on Facebook.com as per internetworldstats.com. The Facebook page will act as a catalyst for community engagement with Citibank customers and will be extensively used to service customer requests.
tag-6: At the onset, customers would be able to earn great rewards and benefit from great deals shared via Citibank UAE Facebook page.
tag-7: Sanjoy Sen, Consumer Bank Head - Middle East, Pakistan & North Africa at Citibank, said: "With the developments in the social media especially in the Arab world, it has become necessary to connect with our customers via Facebook. Citibank is keen on keeping abreast with technology and using it to enhance our relationship with our customers while at the same time provide an efficient and advanced banking experience to them."
tag-8: Michelle Peluso, Global Consumer Chief Marketing & Internet Officer, said, "I'm very happy to see another country launching both of these customer centric services that matches our customers' lifestyles. Citibank UAE is an important business to our overall consumer franchise and these investments are necessary to keep up with the digital changes we experience each day."
tag-9: The story does not end here for Citibank UAE. Following the successful launch of Citi Mobile in 2011, Citibank UAE has taken its mobile application to the next level with location based offers with Citi World Privileges & UAE Privileges. Citi Mobile now allows customers to find Citibank credit and debit card offers across the globe or in UAE in real-time while on-the-go.
tag-10: Customers can look for offers in the area around them with the "Search Nearby" option, which uses the GPS technology on their smart phones or for search for offers by city, merchant, or card type with the "Search by Location" option.
tag-11: Mohammed Al-Tajer, Cluster Marketing Head for the Middle East, Africa and Pakistan, said: "By bringing the superlative banking experience with Citi Mobile right at their fingertips, we have eliminated a few degrees of separation between us and the end users. Now we are with them wherever they are…..banking-on-the-go, in other words."
tag-12: For more details, please visit www.citibank.ae/citimobile.
tag-13: Citi has been in the Middle East for nearly 50 years and currently offers consumer-banking services in the UAE, Bahrain and Egypt. In the UAE alone, Citibank, the consumer banking arm of Citi, has had a presence for the past 47 years and is expanding its major operations within the country. The bank is a major player in the UAE's credit card market and a leading provider of wealth management and consumer credit services.
tag-14: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
